statements: SELECT * FROM Project
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM Project
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location FROM Project
SELECT * FROM Contractor
SELECT contractor_id, contractor_name FROM Contractor
SELECT contractor_id, contractor_name, contractor_license FROM Contractor
SELECT * FROM Task
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM Task
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM Task
SELECT project_name, contractor_name FROM Project, Contractor
SELECT project_name, contractor_name, task_name FROM Project, Contractor, Task
SELECT project_id, project_name, task_name FROM Project, Task
SELECT contractor_id, contractor_name, task_name FROM Contractor, Task
SELECT project_name, task_name, task_description FROM Project, Task
SELECT project_name, task_name, task_description FROM Project INNER JOIN Task ON Project.project_id = Task.task_id
SELECT contractor_name, task_name, task_description FROM Contractor INNER JOIN Task ON Contractor.contractor_id = Task.task_id
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location, task_name, task_description FROM Project INNER JOIN Task ON Project.project_id = Task.task_id
SELECT contractor_id, contractor_name, contractor_license, task_name, task_description FROM Contractor INNER JOIN Task ON Contractor.contractor_id = Task.task_id

SELECT project_name, contractor_name, task_name, task_description FROM Project INNER JOIN Contractor ON Project.project_id = Contractor.contractor_id INNER JOIN Task ON Project.project_id = Task.task_id

SELECT project_name, contractor_name, task_name, task_description FROM Project LEFT JOIN Contractor ON Project.project_id = Contractor.contractor_id LEFT JOIN Task ON Project.project_id = Task.task_id
SELECT * FROM Project WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, location FROM Project WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, quantity, unit_of_measure FROM Material WHERE id = 10
SELECT name, description FROM Task WHERE project_id = 3
SELECT license_number, contact_person FROM Contractor WHERE id = 5
SELECT * FROM Project WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT id, name FROM Contractor WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT * FROM Task WHERE status = 'In Progress'
SELECT name, location, start_date FROM Project WHERE end_date > '2023-02-28'
SELECT id, name, type FROM Material WHERE quantity < 100
SELECT * FROM Contractor WHERE license_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, name, status FROM Task WHERE project_id = 2
SELECT name, description FROM Task WHERE status = 'Completed'
SELECT id, name, contact_person FROM Contractor WHERE contact_number = '555-5555'
SELECT * FROM Project WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, type, quantity, unit_of_measure FROM Material WHERE type = 'Steel'
SELECT id, name, status FROM Task WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Contractor WHERE name LIKE '%Construction%'
SELECT id, name, location FROM Project WHERE end_date > '2023-06-30'
SELECT * FROM Task WHERE status = 'Pending'
